message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $11,000. I believe this offer reflects the value it will bring to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Hi Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,500 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above your target. How about we try $9,800? I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer.
